articles.author: Don Kaye
articles.title: Australian sports stadium to be rebranded as Marvel Stadium
articles.description: The Marvel brand is everywhere: comics, toys, movies, TV shows...and soon to be coming to a sports stadium as well.

articles.description: KAMPALA - Charles Bakkabulindi, Uganda's state minister for sports, has praised the Chinese government's contribution towards sports development in his country.

articles.title: Med Games: Sports minister inaugurates Tarragona stadium
articles.description:
The minister inaugurated Nuo Estadi, the stadium that will host the opening and closing ceremonies
which was renovated with funding provided by the Spanish government

(ANSA)

articles.title: Sochiâ€™s empty stadium reflects Russian sports struggles
articles.description: SOCHI, Russia (AP)  Sochi's World Cup stadium is a spectacular, sweeping structure on the Black Sea coast, but few locals have seen inside. In fact, the Fisht Olympic Stadium hasn't hosted a game in nearly a year.

articles.author: Michael Kennedy
articles.title: Australian Sports Arena Renamed Marvel Stadium
articles.description: As part of Disney's continued campaign to have Marvel dominate the world, an Australian sports arena is set to be renamed Marvel Stadium.

articles.title: Mnangagwa Inauguration At National Sports Stadium
articles.description: [New Zimbabwe] PRESIDENT designate Emmerson Mnangagwa will this Friday take the oath of office at National Sports Stadium rather than State House which was usually preferred by his predecessor.

articles.title: Inside Atletico's new stadium
articles.description: Atletico Madrid will play their first game at their new Wanda Metropolitano Stadium on Saturday, live on Sky Sports Football.

articles.author: Bangkok Post Public Company Limited
articles.title: Sports community mall Stadium One nears open
articles.description: Stadium One, the first sports community mall in downtown Bangkok, is scheduled to open by mid-November and cash in on sporting trends in Thailand.

articles.title: West Ham demand stadium changes
articles.description: Sky Sports understands West Ham are demanding changes to the running of the London Stadium in an emergency meeting.

articles.title: Kenya:Kasarani Stadium Closed Again
articles.description: [Nation] The Moi International Sports Center in Kasarani has once again been closed for renovations despite earlier reports that the venue is completed and ready to host both local and international matches.
